issue.title: [C++] New Appveyor build failures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1294](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1294). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These build failures started showing up randomly, seemingly unrelated to any code changes:

https://ci.appveyor.com/project/ApacheSoftwareFoundation/arrow/build/1.0.2597/job/apggx2imk41yyhhf

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1294?focusedCommentId=16106144) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Seems this is caused by conda-forge upgrading to cmake 3.9.0. I'm going to pin the MSVC build at 3.8.0 to see if this problem goes away

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1294?focusedCommentId=16106156) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 910
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/910>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1294?focusedCommentId=16106184) by Max Risuhin (Max Risuhin):*
`[~wesmckinn]` , great catch! I can't repro this locally with cmake 3.9.0 , it might make sense to investigate directly at Appveyor machine with happened crash via rdp session

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1294?focusedCommentId=16107427) by Max Risuhin (Max Risuhin):*
`[~wesmckinn]`, have created issue for this https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/issues/17118 with additional details.
Was not able to repro the issue manually even on Appveyor build machine just after crash. In general, it seems that in cmake 3.9.0 was implemented manually generated by cmake some kind of test Visual Studio project file to get info about installed VS tools. But possibly some incompatibility causes MSBuild failures time to time.
